title: Fix infinite loading spinner on dashboard

requirements.text: Fix the infinite loading spinner that appears on the worker dashboard, preventing users from seeing any content below the header
acceptanceCriteria: The dashboard loads completely without getting stuck in a loading state
Task list or appropriate content displays below the CanisterTask header
No infinite spinner blocks the user interface

requirements.text: Add error boundary and loading state timeout (5 seconds) to the WorkerDashboard component to prevent indefinite loading states
acceptanceCriteria: Loading spinner times out after 5 seconds if data doesn't load
Appropriate error message displays if loading fails

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the root cause of the dashboard data fetching failure in useQueries hooks or useActor
acceptanceCriteria: Console shows no React Query errors or failed network requests

nonGoals: Adding new features beyond fixing the loading issue
Modifying backend logic unless directly related to the loading failure
